meaning_str.bing:
adj. 大的；大规模的；大量的；（服装、食物、日用品等）大型号的
adv. 大；详细地；夸大地；【航】顺风地
n. 大
网络. 巨大的；大号；大号的

大的；大规模的；大量的；（服装、食物、日用品等）大型号的
大；详细地；夸大地；【航】顺风地

宽敞的；广阔的；大的；庞大的；宏大的；大规模的；大范围的；大尺寸的；大号的；广泛的；众多的；丰富的；慷慨的；重要的；显著的；主要的

1.en: Why on earth anyone of calibre bothers to go on a large public company board is a bit of a mystery.
1.cn: 有些令人费解的是，有才干的人究竟为什么要加入大型上市公司的董事会。

2.en: I smiled back as one of the two women said "Good morning" to us as they were unloading a wheelchair from the side of a large white van.
2.cn: 两位女士正把一架轮椅从一辆白色面包车的一旁卸下来，其中一位向我们说了声“早上好”，我对她报以微笑。

3.en: "You can look at it like a couple of very large uranium mines, " he said of the fissile material that would result from the program.
3.cn: “你可以把它看成好几座大型铀矿（的裂变原料在支持这个方案）。”他说。

0.en: Yes, and evenly distributed amongst brown, white, free-range, large, extra large and jumbo.
0.cn: 对，棕蛋，白蛋，散养鸡蛋，大鸡蛋，加大鸡蛋，跟特大鸡蛋，各要8个。

1.en: You know what they don't sell at The Container Store? Something large enough to contain my disappointment.
1.cn: 你知道容器大卖场里没有卖什么吗？大到可以装下我满心失望的东西。

2.en: Four wives, yes? Five. He also keeps a large harem quite young.
2.cn: 他有四个妻子，是吗？五个，他还有一大群后宫佳丽都很年轻。

3.en: Your earth is a very small part of a very large industry. Feel my skin.
3.cn: 地球只是一个大企业体系中的一小部份。摸摸我的皮肤。

4.en: Here, we grow kombu, large seaweeds which can grow to three metres in length.
4.cn: 我们在这里种植海带，这是能长到3米长的大海藻。

5.en: Yes, yes, I was just trying to figure out a way to, demonstrate how I could get my exceptionally large feet into my even bigger mouth.
5.cn: 是啊，我正在示范如何把我那很大的脚塞进我那更大的嘴里。

6.en: You mean my special day? They're gonna need an extra-large veil for somebody's head.
6.cn: 你是说我的大日子吧？某人的新娘头纱得要加大码的。

7.en: I am perfectly comfortable speaking to small groups. I cannot speak to large crowds.
7.cn: 我在小群体面前能自如讲话，但没法在大群体面前演讲。

8.en: What, to you, is a large crowd? Any group big enough to trample me to death. General rule of thumb is 36 adults or 70 children.
8.cn: 你的大群体怎么定义？大到能把我踩死的那种，按经验估计是36个成人或70个儿童。

9.en: Oh, I didn't, are you talking about that one? It's quite large. I'll take your word for it.
9.cn: 我没有，你是说那个吗？真的很"大"。我相信你。

10.en: If true, that seems like an awfully large gamble given that the prize is Leonard.
10.cn: 如果这是真的，考虑到奖品只是莱纳德，你这个赌注貌似下得大了点。

11.en: The original weapon was absurdly large. Plenty of steel for two swords. Well, thank you. It's glorious.
11.cn: 原剑大得荒唐，足够重铸两柄。谢谢您，真是一柄好剑。

12.en: Stop! Let us out! Here, large popcorn, small soda. Save me a seat, center, about eight rows back.
12.cn: 等等！放我们下去！给，大份爆米花，小份苏打水。给我留个座，中央，八排以后。

13.en: And the credit-card company. Phil made a large purchase on a Tibetan website called CopingCandles.Com.
13.cn: 还有信用卡公司说，菲尔在一家名为“应对困难蜡烛网”的西藏网站上进行了大采购。

14.en: And for Rajesh Koothrappali from whose homeland these tasty dishes originate one large order of chicken McNuggets.
14.cn: 而拉杰·库萨帕里的家乡发明出这些美味佳肴的人，一个大份的麦乐鸡。

15.en: I got a puzzle here, Riley. I got two four-seater vehicles, eight gangsters, and one large bag of heroin.
15.cn: 我还有个闹不明白的地方，莱利，我找到了两辆车，八个黑帮分子，和一大袋海洛因。

16.en: No, now. Evolutionary biologist Robin Dunbar has identified gossip as an aid to social bonding in large groups.
16.cn: 别急啊，进化生物学家罗宾·邓巴把八卦定义为一种有助于在大群体内维系感情的手段。

17.en: And I think I've got it. You consider: a family possesses a dog that is so large and poorly disciplined, he causes nothing but problems.
17.cn: 我想我有主意了，有一家人养了一只特别大的狗，这只狗非常不乖而且麻烦不断。

18.en: I see no large upcoming expenditures unless they develop an affordable technology to fuse my skeleton with Adamantium like Wolverine.
18.cn: 我最近没有什么大的开销，除非他们发明了新的科技能将我的骨骼铸成金刚狼一样的艾德曼合金。

19.en: That was a rather large onion that they've sliced and soaked in butter milk and batter and deep-fried and created into the Blooming Onion.
19.cn: 那是个很大的洋葱，不过现在切片，裹上酪乳并和面粉，然后用油炸，最后就做成了开花洋葱。
